key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and reliance on third-party manufacturers
Legal and financial concerns, including securities class action lawsuits
Competitive and pricing pressures in the plus-size fashion market
Customer retention challenges amid increasing competition
Sustainability scrutiny and slow progress in meeting consumer demands
controversies: Investigation by law firms for potential securities claims related to financial health and supply chain issues
Securities class action lawsuit over alleged misrepresentations about supply chain disruptions
environmental_issues: Criticism for not moving fast enough on sustainability efforts despite initiatives like eco-friendly materials and waste reduction
social_issues: Challenges in maintaining customer loyalty and re-engaging lapsed customers
governance_issues: Scrutiny over transparency and progress in environmental and social governance (ESG) commitments
